Wanted man swindles police with false name, name belongs to another wanted man https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/wanted-man-swindles-police-with-false-name-name-belongs-to-another-wanted-man/E4EFCCF2NZBOBALZAVKM76LINE/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/wanted-man-swindles-police-with-false-name-name-belongs-to-another-wanted-man/E4EFCCF2NZBOBALZAVKM76LINE/ Ben TomsettThe deception was discovered by police following the man's arrest. Mon, 29 Jan 2024 23:38:42 +0000 Peta Kerr pictured with her husband Leonard Bourton. Peta was killed in a double-fatal crash in North Canterbury on Sunday.

Mon, 29 Jan 2024 23:30:33 +0000 The Civil Aviation Authority is investigating after a helicopter crashed on Mt Hyde, Otago near Wānaka.

Mon, 29 Jan 2024 23:20:15 +0000 Gurjit Singh was found dead outside his Dunedin home in unexplained circumstances yesterday morning. Photo / Facebook
